summary: When ants, displaying never-before-seen behavior, seize an island, the controversial Thorax Team is called to stop the massive threat only to discover that the ants are controlled by something beyond this world.
cast: Tom Wopat|Kal Weber|Elizabeth Healey|Jessica Reavis|Mark Ramsey|Pisek Intrakanchit|Kittiphit Tamrongweenijchai|Elizabeth Bodner|Chalad Na Songkhla|Sujinthara Phumjan|Dorrie Salmon|Matthew Boylan
title: The Hive
